summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, dated September 23, 2009. The email discusses a desire to communicate without sending an email or making a phone call, indicating a level of confidentiality and urgency. The email also contains a confidentiality notice regarding its contents.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a need to communicate with Jes Staley without using email or phone.

The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating the information is privileged and confidential.
